meanings.definition: A woman who is extremely unpleasant or difficult to deal with.
meanings.sent1: The superbitch at work always complains about everything.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a superbitch and try to get along with others.
meanings.sent3: The superbitch in the movie made everyone laugh with her grumpy face.
meanings.sent4: Her attitude was like a superbitch guarding her territory.
meanings.sent5: Dealing with that superbitch was like trying to tame a wild animal.

meanings.definition: To behave in an unpleasant or difficult manner.
meanings.sent1: She tends to superbitch whenever things don't go her way.
meanings.sent2: Please don't superbitch about the little things.
meanings.sent3: He superbitches so much, it's almost comical.
meanings.sent4: Her constant superbitching was like nails on a chalkboard.
meanings.sent5: The way she superbitches could make anyone feel uncomfortable.
